short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable you to play youtube links inside facebook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome extension allows you to watch YouTube videos seamlessly while browsing Facebook. With this extension, you no longer have to switch back and forth between tabs to enjoy your favorite videos. Simply click on the YouTube video link in your Facebook newsfeed, and the video will play right there on the page. This makes it easier and more convenient to keep up with your social media while enjoying your favorite YouTube content. Plus, it saves you time and effort by eliminating the need to switch between tabs. Whether you're a YouTube addict or a social media enthusiast, this extension is sure to enhance your browsing experience.
